message:
http://www.mopri.de/2010/timertask-bad-do-it-the-android-way-use-a-handler/
This info was very useful to me.... may be it solves a bug with u also
story: Mohammad Hefny shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Timer(Task) = bad! Do it the Android way: Use a Handler :)
caption: mopri.de
description: Well, after programming a while for Android I got in touch with some things that are different from usual Java. I already mentioned that before, when I decided to start writing about my experiences with Android: Android & Memory (Leaks)
